item.description: Planned Parenthood League of Massachusetts (PPLM), in partnership with MassEquality and AIDS Action Committee, is kicking-off its annual Get Yourself Tested campaign for 2010. As part of our initiative to help raise awareness about sexually transmitted diseases (STDs) and the importance of getting tested and treated, we will be hosting a cocktail party at Club Caf√© on Wednesday, May 5th at 6:30 p.m. All guests will be entered into a raffle to win a great prize. Complimentary appetizers will be served and opening remarks will be made by representatives from all 3 organizations.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Napoleon Room at the front of the venue.
item.name: Get Yourself Tested NOW
